alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:17PM MDT until July 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 417 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Black Hawk, or 6 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Black Hawk, Summerset, Johnson Siding, Hisega, Rockerville, Bear Country, Reptile Gardens and Rapid City Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 50 and 63. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
